summary: REQ-2 is implemented via the added redeploy trigger file for build 64. REQ-1 (actual deployment of build 64 to Live) is not verifiable/implemented in the provided diff. The diff also includes multiple changes that appear to introduce functional/product changes and extra operational markers beyond the BuildRequest constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the current successful build (version 64) to the Live environment.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows repository file changes; it does not contain any evidence of an actual Live deployment or configuration change that would deploy build 64 or make the Live URL serve build 64.
evidence: File diff summary shows only repo file adds/modifications; no deployment logs/configs/actions are included.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an extra publish marker file frontend/publish-live.build64.txt not requested by REQ-2 (which only asked for frontend/redeploy-trigger.build64.txt if needed).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies adding a redeploy trigger file (modeled after build 63) if needed; it does not request an additional publish marker file.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend functional/code changes in backend/main.mo, violating the constraint to not introduce functional product changes (and non-goal of changing backend data structures or logic).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is operational (publish build 64) and explicitly disallows backend logic/data structure changes; backend/main.mo is modified and contains extensive type/model definitions, indicating potential logic/product changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend/UI/product changes described in the modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (new tabs, redesigned footer/header, new modal, new manager delegation hooks, UI spacing/typography changes, etc.), violating the non-goals of adding new frontend features or UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states no new frontend features or UI changes; the summary describes multiple UI redesigns and new functionality (e.g., Boss-only Managers tab, profile setup modal).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json (new_feature_requests entries).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; operational publish request did not ask for updating internal project state metadata.
